   MSS_0001 1 aṃśavastava niśākara nūnaṃ kalpitāstaruṇaketakakhaṇḍaiḥ /	MSS_0001 1 aMSavaH tava niSAkara nUnam kalpitAH taruNa ketaka KaNxEH /

   yatsamaṃ svīkaroṣi //	yad samam svIkarozi //

   MSS_1459 1 anudinamatitīvraṃ rodiṣīti tvamuccaiḥ sakhi kila kuruṣe tvaṃ	MSS_1459 1 anudinam ati tIvram rodizi iti tvam uccEs saKi kila kuruze tvam
   vācyatāṃ me mudhaiva /	vAcyatAm me muDA eva /

   MSS_2580 1 ambāyāśca pituśca sadguṇagaṇo yasminnabhivyajyate tasmin	MSS_2580 1 ambAyAH ca pituH ca sat guNa gaNaH yasmin= aBivyajyate tasmin

   MSS_2956 2 mā māṃ kaścidiha grahīditi muhuḥ sāśaṅkamāpaśyataś caurasyeva	MSS_2956 2 mA mAm kaScid iha grahIt iti muhur sa ASaFkam ApaSyataH cOrasya iva
   kaverbhayaṃ bhavati yattadvidviṣāmastu vaḥ //	kaveH Bayam Bavati yat tat vidvizAmaH tu vaH //

   MSS_2957 2 vaśyaśca putro'rthakarī ca vidyā ṣaḍ jīvalokasya sukhāni rājan	MSS_2957 2 vaSyaH ca putraH arTa karI ca vidyA zaw jIva lokasya suKAni rAjan

   MSS_3751 1 asāvahaṃ lohamayī sa yasyāḥ krūraḥ sakhi prastara eṣa kāntaḥ /	MSS_3751 1 asO= aham loha mayI sa yasyAH krUraH saKi prastaraH eza kAntaH /

   MSS_4525 1 ātanvadbhirdikṣu patrāgranādaṃ prāptairdūrādāśu	MSS_4525 1 AtanvadBiH dikzu patra agra nAdam prAptEH dUrAt ASu
   tīkṣṇairmukhāgraiḥ /	tIkzNEH muKa agrEH /
   MSS_4525 2 ādau raktaṃ sainikānāmajīvair jīvaiḥ paścāt patripūgairapāyi //	MSS_4525 2 AdO raktam sEnikAnAm ajIvEH jIvEH paScAt patri pUgEH apAyi //
   MSS_4526 1 ātapatyaviduṣāmamṛtāṃśum aṃśumantamapi raśmisahasre /	MSS_4526 1 Atapati aviduzAm amRtAMSum aMSumantam api raSmi sahasre /
   MSS_4526 2 rāgiṇāṃ bhavati lakṣaṇamindor indranīlaśakalacchavilakṣma //	MSS_4526 2 rAgiNAm Bavati lakzaNam indoH indranIla Sakala= Cavi lakzmaH //
   MSS_4527 1 ātapāsahanaḥ pāṇḍuḥ śākhāhīno muhur yadi /	MSS_4527 1 Atapa asahanaH pANxuH SAKA hInaH muhur yadi /
   MSS_4527 2 akālaphalapākī syāc chākhī pittātmakaḥ kṛśaḥ //	MSS_4527 2 akAla Pala pAkI syAt SAKI pitta AtmakaH kRSaH //
   MSS_4528 1 ātape dhṛtimatā saha vadhvā yāminīvirahiṇā vihagena /	MSS_4528 1 Atape DRtimatA saha vaDvA yAminI virahiNA vihagena /
   MSS_4528 2 sehire na kiraṇā himaraśmer duḥkhite manasi sarvamasahyam //	MSS_4528 2 sehire na kiraNAH himaraSmeH duHKite manasi sarvam asahyam //
   MSS_4529 1 ātaralāghavahetor murahara tariṃ tavāvalambe /	MSS_4529 1 AtaralAGava hetoH mura hara tarim tava avalambe /
   MSS_4529 2 apaṇaṃ paṇamiha kuruṣe nāvikapuruṣe na viśvāsaḥ //	MSS_4529 2 apaNam paNam iha kuruze nAvika puruze na viSvAsaH //
   MSS_4530 1 ātāmratāmapanayāmi vivarṇa eṣa lākṣākṛtāṃ caraṇayostava devi	MSS_4530 1 AtAmra tAm apanayAmi vivarNaH eza lAkzA akRtAm caraNayoH tava devi
   mūrdhnā /	mUrDnA /
   MSS_4530 2 kopoparāgajanitāṃ tu mukhendubimbe hartuṃ kṣamo yadi paraṃ	MSS_4530 2 kopa uparAga janitAm tu muKa indu bimbe hartum kzamaH yadi param
   karuṇāmayi syāt //	karuNA mayi syAt //
   MSS_4531 1 ātāmrāḥ kiraṇā ravernavadalatvakpallavāḥ pādapāḥ	MSS_4531 1 AtAmrAH kiraNAH raveH navadala tvac pallavAH pAdapAH
   vallyastārakatulyakāntisumanaḥsaurabhyasaṃbhāvitāḥ /	vallyaH tAraka tulya kAnti sumanaH sOraBya saMBAvitAH /
   MSS_4531 2 vātyasmin madhumattaṣaṭpadapadavyādhūtacūtadruma 	MSS_4531 2 vAti asmin maDu matta zawpada pada vyADUta cUta druma 
   prāgbhāraprapatatparāgapaṭalāmodī marud dākṣiṇaḥ //	prAgBAra prapatat parAga pawalA modI marut dAkziNaH //
   MSS_4532 1 ātāmrābhā roṣabhājaḥ kaṭāntād āśūtkhāte mārgaṇe dhūrgatena /	MSS_4532 1 AtAmra ABAH roza BAjaH kawAntAt ASu ut KAte mArgaNe DUrgatena /
   MSS_4532 2 niścyotantī nāgarājasya jajñe dānasyāho lohitasyeva dhārā //	MSS_4532 2 niScyotantI nAga rAjasya jajQe dAnasya aho lohitasya iva DArAH //
   MSS_4533 1 ātāmrāyatalocanāṃśulaharīlīlāsudhāp yāyitaiḥ	MSS_4533 1 AtAmra Ayata locana aMSula harI lIlA suDAp yAyitEH
   gītāmreḍitadivyakelibharitaiḥ sphītaṃ vrajastrījanaiḥ /	gIta amrexita divya keli BaritEH sPItam vraja strI janEH /
   MSS_4533 2 svedāmbhaḥkaṇabhūṣitena kimapi smereṇa vaktrendunā	MSS_4533 2 sveda amBaH kaNa BUzitena kim api smereNa vaktra indunA
   pādāmbhojamṛdupracārasubhagaṃ paśyāmi dṛśyaṃ mahaḥ //	pAda amBoja mRdu pracAra suBagam paSyAmi dRSyam mahaH //
   MSS_4534 1 ātāmre nayane sphuran kucabharaḥ śvāso na viśrāmyati	MSS_4534 1 AtAmre nayane sPuran kuca BaraH SvAsaH na viSrAmyati
   svedāmbhaḥkaṇadanturaṃ tava mukhaṃ hetustu no lakṣyate /	sveda amBaH kaNa danturam tava muKam hetuH tu naH lakzyate /
   MSS_4534 2 dhik ko veda manaḥ striyā iti girā ruṣṭāṃ priyāṃ bhīṣayaṃs	MSS_4534 2 Dik kaH veda manaH striyAH iti girA ruzwAm priyAm BIzayan= 
   tasyāstatkṣaṇakātarekṣaṇaparispṛṣṭo hariḥ pātu vaḥ //	tasyAH tad kzaNa kAtara IkzaNa parispRzwaH hariH pAtu vaH //
   MSS_4535 1 ātāmrau pūjitāvoṣṭhau lelihānau mṛdutvacau /	MSS_4535 1 AtAmrO pUjitO= ozWO lelihAnO mRdu tvacO /
   MSS_4535 2 jihvā raktā ca tanvī ca tālu raktaṃ praśasyate //	MSS_4535 2 jihvA raktA ca tanvI ca tAlu raktam praSasyate //
   MSS_4536 1 ātāruṇyodbhedāt kānte dṛṣṭiryathā nyastā /	MSS_4536 1 AtAruNya udBedAt kAnte dRzwiH yaTA nyastAH /
   MSS_4536 2 sāmājikamadhyasthā kathamanyā samupayāti parabhāgam //	MSS_4536 2 sAmAjika maDya sTA kaTam anyA samupayAti para BAgam //
   MSS_4537 1 ātithyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ tu kuryāt pratidinaṃ gṛhe /	MSS_4537 1 AtiTyam brAhmaNAnAm tu kuryAt pratidinam gRhe /

   MSS_4539 1 āturasya kuto nidrā trastasyāmarṣitasya ca /	MSS_4539 1 Aturasya kutas nidrA trastasya amarzitasya ca /

   MSS_4541 1 āture ca pitā vaidyaḥ svasthībhūte ca bāndhavaḥ /	MSS_4541 1 Ature ca pitA vEdyaH svasTIBUte ca bAnDavaH /

   MSS_4543 2 añjalau jalamadhīralocanā locanapratiśarīralāñchitam //	MSS_4543 2 aQjalO jalam aDIra locanA locana pratiSarIra lAQCitam //
   MSS_4544 1 ātte vāsasi roddhumakṣamatayā doḥkandalībhyāṃ stanau	MSS_4544 1 Atte vAsasi rodDum akzamatayA doHkandalIByAm stanO
   tasyoraḥsthalamuttarīyaviṣaye sadyo mayā sañjitam /	tasya uraH sTalam uttarIya vizaye sadyas mayA saQjitam /
   MSS_4544 2 śroṇīṃ tasya kare'dhirohati punarvrīḍāmbudhau māmatho	MSS_4544 2 SroNIm tasya kare aDirohati punar vrIxA ambuDO mAm aTo

   MSS_4545 1 ātte sīmantaratne marakatini hṛte hematāṭaṅkapatre luptāyāṃ	MSS_4545 1 Atte sImanta ratne marakatini hRte hema tAwaFka patre luptAyAm
   mekhalāyāṃ jhaṭiti maṇitulākoṭiyugme gṛhīte /	meKalAyAm Jawiti maNi tulA kowi yugme gRhIte /
   MSS_4545 2 śoṇaṃ bimboṣṭhakāntyā tvadarimṛgadṛśāmitvarīṇāmaraṇye rājan	MSS_4545 2 SoNam bimba uzWa kAntyA tvad ari mRga dRSAmitu arINAm araNye rAjan
   guñjāphalānāṃ sraja iti śabarā naiva hāraṃ haranti //	guQjA PalAnAm srajaH iti SabarAH na eva hAram haranti //
   MSS_4546 1 ātmakāryaṃ mahākāryaṃ parakāryaṃ na kevalam /	MSS_4546 1 Atma kAryam mahAkAryam para kAryam na kevalam /
   MSS_4546 2 ātmakāryasya doṣeṇa kūpe patati mānavaḥ //	MSS_4546 2 Atma kAryasya dozeNa kUpe patati mAnavaH //

   MSS_4549 1 ātmajanmāspadaṃ vaṃśaṃ kāmaṃ dahana vāryase /	MSS_4549 1 Atmajanma Aspadam vaMSam kAmam dahana vAryase /

   MSS_4551 2 dharmakṛd vedavidyāvit sāttviko devayonitām //	MSS_4551 2 Darma kRt veda vidyA vid sAttvikaH deva yoni tAm //

   MSS_4558 1 ātmadveṣād bhaven mṛtyuḥ paradveṣād dhanakṣayaḥ /	MSS_4558 1 Atma dvezAt Bavet mRtyuH para dvezAt Dana kzayaH /

   MSS_4559 1 ātmanaḥ pratikūlāni parebhyo yadi necchasi /	MSS_4559 1 AtmanaH pratikUlAni pareByaH yadi na icCasi /

   MSS_4561 1 ātmanaḥ śaktimudvīkṣya mānotsāhau tu yo vrajet /	MSS_4561 1 AtmanaH Saktim udvIkzya mAna utsAhO tu yaH vrajet /
   MSS_4561 2 śatrūneko'pi hanyācca kṣatriyān bhārgavo yathā //	MSS_4561 2 SatrUn ekaH api hanyAt ca kzatriyAn BArgavaH yaTA //
   MSS_4562 1 ātmanaśca paritrāṇe dakṣiṇānāṃ ca saṃgare /	MSS_4562 1 AtmanaH ca paritrANe dakziNAnAm ca saMgare /
   MSS_4562 2 strīviprābhyupapattau ca ghnan dharmeṇa na duṣyati //	MSS_4562 2 strI vipra aByupapattO ca Gnan DarmeNa na duzyati //
   MSS_4563 1 ātmanaśca pareṣāṃ ca pratāpastava kīrtinut /	MSS_4563 1 AtmanaH ca parezAm ca pratApaH tava kIrti nud /

   MSS_4564 1 ātmanaśca pareṣāṃ ca yaḥ samīkṣya balābalam /	MSS_4564 1 AtmanaH ca parezAm ca yaH samIkzya balAbalam /
   MSS_4564 2 antaraṃ naiva jānāti sa tiraskriyate'ribhiḥ //	MSS_4564 2 antaram na eva jAnAti sa tiraskriyate ariBiH //
   MSS_4565 1 ātmanaścapalo nāsti kuto'nyeṣāṃ bhaviṣyati /	MSS_4565 1 AtmanaH capalaH na asti kutas anyezAm Bavizyati /

   MSS_4566 1 ātmanaśca prajāyāśca doṣadarśyuttamo nṛpaḥ /	MSS_4566 1 AtmanaH ca prajAyAH ca doza darSI uttamaH nRpaH /

   MSS_4567 1 ātmanātmānamanvicchen manobuddhīndriyairyataiḥ /	MSS_4567 1 AtmanA AtmAnam anvicCet manaH budDi indriyEH yatEH /
   MSS_4567 2 ātmaiva hyātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripurātmanaḥ //	MSS_4567 2 AtmA eva hi AtmanaH banDuH AtmA eva ripuH AtmanaH //
   MSS_4568 1 ātmanānarthayuktena pāpe niviśate manaḥ /	MSS_4568 1 AtmanA anarTa yuktena pApe niviSate manaH /

   MSS_4569 1 ātmanāma gurornāma nāmātikṛpaṇasya ca /	MSS_4569 1 Atma nAma guroH nAma nAma atikRpaNasya ca /
   MSS_4569 2 āyuṣkāmo na gṛhṇīyāt jyeṣṭhāpatyakalatrayoḥ //	MSS_4569 2 AyuzkAmaH na gRhNIyAt jyezWa apatya kalatrayoH //
   MSS_4570 1 ātmanā vihitaṃ duḥkham ātmanā vihitaṃ sukham /	MSS_4570 1 AtmanA vihitam duHKam AtmanA vihitam suKam /

   MSS_4571 1 ātmanāśāya nonnatyai chidreṇa paripūrṇatā /	MSS_4571 1 Atma nASAya na unnatyE CidreNa paripUrNa tA /
   MSS_4571 2 bhūyo bhūyo ghaṭīpātraṃ nimajjat kiṃ na paśyasi //	MSS_4571 2 BUyas BUyas GawI pAtram nimajjat kim na paSyasi //
   MSS_4572 1 ātmanā saṃgṛhītena śatruṇā śatrumuddharet /	MSS_4572 1 AtmanA saMgRhItena SatruNA Satrum udDaret /
   MSS_4572 2 padalagnaṃ karasthena kaṇṭakenaiva kaṇṭakam //	MSS_4572 2 pada lagnam kara sTena kaNwakena eva kaNwakam //
   MSS_4573 1 ātmanindātmapūjā ca paranindā parastavaḥ /	MSS_4573 1 Atma nindA Atma pUjA ca para nindA para stavaH /
   MSS_4573 2 anācaritamāryāṇāṃ vṛttametaccaturvidham //	MSS_4573 2 anAcaritam AryANAm vRttam etat caturviDam //
   MSS_4574 1 ātmanīnamupatiṣṭhate guṇāḥ saṃbhavanti viramanti cāpadaḥ /	MSS_4574 1 AtmanInam upatizWate guNAH saMBavanti viramanti ca ApadaH /
   MSS_4574 2 ityanekaphalabhāji mā sma bhūd arthitā kathamivāryasaṃgame //	MSS_4574 2 iti aneka Pala BAji mA sma BUt arTitA kaTam iva Arya saMgame //
   MSS_4575 1 ātmanaiva guṇadoṣakovidaḥ kiṃ na vetsi karaṇīyavastuṣu /	MSS_4575 1 AtmanA eva guNa doza kovidaH kim na vetsi karaNIya vastuzu /
   MSS_4575 2 yattathāpi na gurūn na pṛcchasi tvaṃ kramo'yamiti tatra kāraṇam	MSS_4575 2 yat taTA api na gurUn na pRcCasi tvam kramaH ayam iti tatra kAraNam
   MSS_4576 1 ātmano gururātmaiva puruṣasya viśeṣataḥ /	MSS_4576 1 AtmanaH guruH AtmA eva puruzasya viSezataH /
   MSS_4576 2 yat pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ śreyo'sāvanuvindate //	MSS_4576 2 yat pratyakza anumAnAByAm SreyaH asO= anuvindate //
   MSS_4577 1 ātmano na sahāyārthaṃ pitā mātā ca tiṣṭhati /	MSS_4577 1 AtmanaH na sahAya arTam pitA mAtA ca tizWati /
   MSS_4577 2 na putradārā na jñātir dharmastiṣṭhati kevalam //	MSS_4577 2 na putra dArA na jQAtiH DarmaH tizWati kevalam //
   MSS_4578 1 ātmano balamajñātvā dharmārthaparivarjitam /	MSS_4578 1 AtmanaH balam ajQAtvA Darma arTa parivarjitam /

   MSS_7012 2 pātre dānaṃ paraḥ kāmaḥ paro mokṣo vitṛṣṇatā //	MSS_7012 2 pAtre dAnam paraH kAmaH paraH mokzaH vitRzNa tA //
   MSS_7013 1 upakārakamāyaterbhṛśaṃ prasavaḥ karmaphalasya bhūriṇaḥ /	MSS_7013 1 upakArakam AyateH BRSam prasavaH karma Palasya BUriNaH /

   MSS_7016 2 asatāmaniśaṃ tathāpyaho guruhṛdrogakarī tadunnatiḥ //	MSS_7016 2 asatAm aniSam taTA api aho guru hRd roga karI tad unnatiH //

   dhuryaḥ //	DuryaH //
   MSS_7031 1 upakāriṣu yaḥ sādhuḥ sādhutve tasya ko guṇaḥ /	MSS_7031 1 upakArizu yaH sADuH sADu tve tasya kaH guNaH /

   pīyūṣeṇāpyaśeṣadivaukasām /	pIyUzeNa api aSeza divOkasAm /

   MSS_7066 2 paśya vānaramūrkheṇa sugṛhī nirgṛhīkṛtā //	MSS_7066 2 paSya vAnara mUrKeNa su gRhI nirgRhIkRtAH //
   MSS_7067 1 upadeśo hi mūrkhāṇāṃ krodhāyaiva śamāya na /	MSS_7067 1 upadeSaH hi mUrKANAm kroDAya eva SamAya na /
   MSS_7067 2 payaḥpānaṃ bhuja gānāṃ viṣāyaivāmṛtāya na //	MSS_7067 2 payaH pAnam Buja gAnAm vizAya eva amRtAya na //

   MSS_7068 2 payaḥpānaṃ bhuja gānāṃ kevalaṃ viṣavardhanaṃ //	MSS_7068 2 payaH pAnam Buja gAnAm kevalam viza varDanam //

   MSS_7310 2 sa mukto mārgaṇo lakṣyād dūraṃ yāti na saṃśayaḥ //	MSS_7310 2 sa muktaH mArgaNaH lakzyAt dUram yAti na saMSayaH //
   MSS_7311 1 ūrdhvaṃvrīhitrayaṃ mānam aṅgulasya nigadyate /	MSS_7311 1 UrDvaMvrIhi trayam mAnam aFgulasya nigadyate /
   MSS_7311 2 hasto'pi hi samākhyātaś caturviśadbhiraṅgulaiḥ //	MSS_7311 2 hastaH api hi samAKyAtaH catur viSadBiH aFgulEH //
   MSS_7312 1 ūrdhvaṃ śvasaṃstataḥ prāṇo yātyalabdhasthitis tanoḥ /	MSS_7312 1 UrDvam Svasan= tatas prANaH yAti alabDa sTitiH tanoH /
   MSS_7312 2 taṃ yāntamanuyātyeva jīvaḥ kālapraṇoditaḥ //	MSS_7312 2 tam yAntam anuyAti eva jIvaH kAla praNoditaH //
   MSS_7313 1 ūrdhvagaṃ kapilābhāsam aṅgaṃ yasmin pratīyate /	MSS_7313 1 UrDva gam kapila ABAsam aFgam yasmin pratIyate /
   MSS_7313 2 nakulāṅgaṃ tu taṃ vidyāt sparśas tasyāhināśanaḥ //	MSS_7313 2 nakula aFgam tu tam vidyAt sparSaH tasya ahi nASanaH //
   MSS_7314 1 ūrdhvabāhur viraumyeṣa na ca kaścic śrṇoti me /	MSS_7314 1 UrDvabAhuH virOmi eza na ca kaScid SrNoti me /
   MSS_7314 2 dharmādarthaśca kāmaśca sa kimarthaṃ na sevyate //	MSS_7314 2 DarmAt arTaH ca kAmaH ca sa kim arTam na sevyate //
   MSS_7315 1 ūrdhvavedhī bhavej jyeṣṭho nābhivedī ca madhyamaḥ /	MSS_7315 1 UrDva veDI Bavet jyezWaH nABivedI ca maDyamaH /
   MSS_7315 2 yaḥ pādavedhī lakṣyasya sa kaniṣṭho mato mayā //	MSS_7315 2 yaH pAda veDI lakzyasya sa kanizWaH mataH mayA //

   MSS_7317 2 evaṃ hi saṃdhyāsamaye'nyadā tu nirvāsakāḥ syurnagarasya tasya	MSS_7317 2 evam hi saMDyA samaye anyadA tu nirvAsakAH syuH nagarasya tasya
   MSS_7318 1 ūrdhvārohe ya ālambahetur bhūbhṛc chinatti tam /	MSS_7318 1 UrDva Arohe yaH Alamba hetuH BUBRt Cinatti tam /

   niryayuḥ //	niryayuH //

   MSS_7323 1 ūṣareṣu ca kṣetreṣu yathā bījaṃ hi niṣphalam /	MSS_7323 1 Uzarezu ca kzetrezu yaTA bIjam hi nizPalam /

   MSS_7324 1 ūṣareṣu vivareṣu cāmbhasāṃ vīcayo'pi bhavatā vinirmitāḥ /	MSS_7324 1 Uzarezu vivarezu ca amBasAm vIcayaH api BavatA vinirmitAH /

   MSS_7325 1 ūṣare sariti śālmalīvane dāvapāvakacite'pi candane /	MSS_7325 1 Uzare sariti SAlmalI vane dAva pAvaka cite api candane /

   MSS_7326 1 ūṣmavyapetā rahitāśca vṛddhyā saṃyogahīnā laghavo'pi cāntaḥ /	MSS_7326 1 Uzma vyapetAH rahitAH ca vRdDyA saMyoga hInAH laGavaH api ca antar /
   MSS_7326 2 ślokasya varṇā iva vidviṣaste pādāntamāgamya gurūbhavanti //	MSS_7326 2 Slokasya varNAH iva vidvizaH te pAda antam Agamya guru uBavanti //
   MSS_7327 1 ūṣmā yasyāṃ dhātryāṃ dhūmo vā tatra vāri narayugale /	MSS_7327 1 UzmA yasyAm DAtryAm DUmaH vA tatra vAri nara yugale /

   MSS_7329 1 ṛkṣasya kroḍasaṃdhiprahitamukhatayā maṇḍalībhūtamūrter ārāt	MSS_7329 1 Rkzasya kroxa saMDi prahita muKa tayA maNxalIBUta mUrteH ArAt

   MSS_7331 1 ṛkṣairvṛto haripade nivasan samīra  saṃtānaśaityajanakaḥ	MSS_7331 1 RkzEH vRtaH hari pade nivasan samIra saMtAna SEtya janakaH

   citramanaṅgado'yam //	citram anaFga daH ayam //

   MSS_7333 1 ṛjutāṃ nayataḥ smarāmi te śaramutsaṅganiṣaṇṇadhanvanaḥ /	MSS_7333 1 Rju tAm nayataH smarAmi te Saram utsaFga nizaNNa DanvanaH /

   MSS_7359 2 yācakādyaiḥ prārthitaḥ san na tīkṣṇaṃ cottaraṃ vadet /	MSS_7359 2 yAcaka AdyEH prArTitaH san na tIkzNam ca uttaram vadet /
   MSS_7359 3 tatkāryaṃ tu samarthaścet kuryād vā kārayīta ca //	MSS_7359 3 tat kAryam tu samarTaH ced kuryAt vA kArayIta ca //
   MSS_7360 1 ṛṇaśeṣo'gniśeṣaśca vyādhiśeṣas tathaiva ca /	MSS_7360 1 RNa SezaH agniSezaH ca vyADi SezaH taTA eva ca /
   MSS_7360 2 punaśca vardhate yasmāt tasmāccheṣaṃ ca kārayet //	MSS_7360 2 punar ca varDate yasmAt tasmAt Sezam ca kArayet //

   MSS_9968 2 tasmādetad viśeṣasmṛtikalitamiha prekṣya sākṣādupekṣyaṃ varyaṃ	MSS_9968 2 tasmAt etat viSeza smRti kalitam iha prekzya sAkzAt upekzyam varyam
   śauryaṃcanādau na gamaya samayaṃ tvaṃ vrajastrīhitajñaḥ //	SOryaMcana AdO na gamaya samayam tvam vraja strI hita jQaH //
   MSS_9969 1 kāsāre'pi payaḥ pibanti pathikā na kvāpi vāri tvayi	MSS_9969 1 kAsAre api payaH pibanti paTikA na kvApi vAri tvayi
   kṣāratvādudadheḥ samudra iti te nāmaitadevocitam /	kzAra tvAt udaDeH samudraH iti te nAma etat eva ucitam /
   MSS_9969 2 na tvetāni nirarthakāni bhavato nāmānyanarthāntarāṇy	MSS_9969 2 na tu etAni nirarTakAni BavataH nAmAni anarTa antarANi 
   ambhodhirjaladhiḥ payonidhirudadhirvārāṃnidhirvāridhiḥ //	amBoDiH jalaDiH payoniDiH udaDiH vArAMniDiH vAriDiH //
   MSS_9970 1 kāsāre madamattavāraṇagaṇairākumbhamagnaṃ payaḥ pītaṃ	MSS_9970 1 kAsAre mada matta vAraNa gaNEH AkumBa magnam payaH pItam
   yatprabhavoruvīcivalanairvyāptaṃ samastaṃ jagat /	yad praBava uru vI ci valanEH vyAptam samastam jagat /
   MSS_9970 2 tasminneva raveḥ pracaṇḍakiraṇaśreṇīnipītāmbhasi prāptāḥ	MSS_9970 2 tasmin= eva raveH pracaNxa kiraNa SreNI nipIta amBasi prAptAH
   pānthanakhaṃpacāḥ pratipadaṃ madhyasthalībhūmayaḥ //	pAnTana KaMpacAH pratipadam maDya sTalIBUmayaH //
   MSS_9971 1 kāsāreṣu saritsu sindhuṣu tathā nīceṣu nīragrahaṃ dhik tatrāpi	MSS_9971 1 kAsArezu saritsu sinDuzu taTA nIcezu nIra graham Dik tatra api
   śironatiḥ kimaparaṃ heyaṃ bhaven māninām /	SiraH natiH kim aparam heyam Bavet mAninAm /
   MSS_9971 2 ityālocya vimucya cātakayuvā teṣu spṛhāmādarād udgrīvas tava	MSS_9971 2 iti Alocya vimucya cAtaka yuvA tezu spRhAm AdarAt udgrIvaH tava
   vārivāha kurute dhārādharālokanam //	vArivAha kurute DArADara Alokanam //
   MSS_9971A 1 kāsāryavarya kalitāmburuhāvataṃsa	MSS_9971A 1 kAsArya varya kalita amburuha avataMsa
   muktāsamānajalabindutaraṅgaraṅga /	muktA samAna jala bindu taraFga raFga /
   MSS_9971A 2 kiṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ tava bakairbahubhiḥ kurārvair haṃsairvinā	MSS_9971A 2 kim BUzaNam tava bakEH bahuBiH kurArvEH haMsEH vinA
   kalaravairnaradevapūjyaiḥ //	kala ravEH naradeva pUjyEH //
   MSS_9972 1 kāsi tvaṃ vada cauryakāriṇi kutaḥ, kastvaṃ, puroyāmikaḥ kiṃ	MSS_9972 1 kA asi tvam vada cOrya kAriNi kutas , kaH tvaM, puroyAmikaH kim
   brūṣe, muṣitau suvarṇakalaśau bhūpasya, kena, tvayā /	brUze, muzitO suvarNa kalaSO BUpasya, kena, tvayA /
   MSS_9972 2 kutra staḥ, prakaṭau tavāñcalataṭe, kutreti, taptaśyatām	MSS_9972 2 kutra staH, prakawO tava aQcala tawe, kutra iti, taptaSyatAm
   ityukte dhṛtavallavīkucayugastvaṃ pātu pītāmbaraḥ //	iti ukte DRta vallavI kuca yugaH tvam pAtu pIta ambaraH //
   MSS_9973 1 kāsī vivarjayec cauryaṃ nidrāluś carmaṃcaurikām /	MSS_9973 1 kAsI vivarjayet cOryam nidrAluH carmaMcOrikAm /
   MSS_9973 2 jihvālaulyaṃ ca rogāḍhyo jīvituṃ yo'tra vāñchati //	MSS_9973 2 jihvA lOlyam ca roga AXyaH jIvitum yaH atra vAQCati //
   MSS_9974 1 kāse śvāse tathā śoṣe mandāgnau viṣamajvare /	MSS_9974 1 kAse SvAse taTA Soze manda agnO vizamajvare /
   MSS_9974 2 pramehe mūtrakṛcchre ca sevayenmadhupippalīm //	MSS_9974 2 pramehe mUtrakRcCre ca sevayet maDu pippalIm //
   MSS_9975 1 kā strī na praṇayivaśā kā vilasitayo manobhavavihīnāḥ /	MSS_9975 1 kA strI na praNayi vaSA kAH vilasitayaH manoBava vihInAH /
   MSS_9975 2 ko dharmo nirupaśamaḥ kiṃ saukhyaṃ vallabhena rahitānām //	MSS_9975 2 kaH DarmaH nirupaSamaH kim sOKyam vallaBena rahitAnAm //
   MSS_9976 1 kāsvid avaguṇṭhanavatī nātiparisphuṭaśarīralāvaṇyā /	MSS_9976 1 kAsviD avaguNWanavatI na ati parisPuwa SarIra lAvaNyA /
   MSS_9976 2 madhye tapodhanānāṃ kisalayamiva pāṇḍupatrāṇām //	MSS_9976 2 maDye tapoDanAnAm kisalayam iva pANxu patrANAm //
   MSS_9977 1 kāhamasmi guhā vakti praśne'muṣmin kimuttaram /	MSS_9977 1 kAham asmi guhA vakti praSne amuzmin kim uttaram /
   MSS_9977 2 kathamuktaṃ na jānāsi kadarthayasi yat sakhe //	MSS_9977 2 kaTam uktam na jAnAsi kadarTayasi yat saKe //
   MSS_9978 1 kāharniśamanucintyā samsārāsāratā na tu pramadā /	MSS_9978 1 kA aharniSamanucintyA samsAra asAra tA na tu pramadA /
   MSS_9978 2 kā preyasī vidheyā karuṇā dākṣiṇyamatha maitrī //	MSS_9978 2 kA preyasI viDeyA karuNA dAkziNyam aTa mEtrI //
   MSS_9979 1 kā hi tulāmadhirohati bhujagalatāyāḥ pratāninīṣvanyā /	MSS_9979 1 kA hi tulAm aDirohati Bujaga latAyAH pratAninIzu anyA /
   MSS_9979 2 yā khaṇḍitāpi radanair janayati vadane vicakṣaṇāṃ suṣamām //	MSS_9979 2 yA KaNxitA api radanEH janayati vadane vicakzaNAm suzamAm //
